actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to permit certain officers discharged from the Army to reenlist in the Army.

summary.text: Entitles former enlisted officers of the Regular Army who were honorably discharged to reenlist without loss of seniority or credit for service within six months after the date of such discharge or six months after the enactment of this Act, whichever is later. (Adds 10 U.S.C. 3258A)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to permit certain officers discharged from the Army to reenlist in the Army.
